description.ko: 현실의 경계가 희미해지고 고대 은하의 잔해들이 고요한 흑색 바다를 표류하는 VOID-3의 가장 깊은 구역에 대한 몰입형 탐사입니다.
description.en: An immersive exploration of the deepest sectors of VOID-3, where the fabric of reality thins and the remnants of ancient galaxies drift in a silent, obsidian sea.

prompt: A cinematic ultra-high-definition capture of VOID-3, showcasing the 'Cosmic Deep' theme. Swirling gravitational eddies of midnight blue and deep violet gas clouds, distant dying stars emitting a faint spectral glow, ripples in space-time manifesting as shimmering translucent waves, hyper-realistic textures of cosmic dust, 8k resolution, volumetric lighting, silent and expansive atmosphere.
